name: Trials Of Abaddon
description:
BECOME LEGEND!

The world tree is in peril, the evil forces are set upon taking it down and bringing the extinction of humanity! 

You alone or with your friends are the only hope the world has to end this danger!

Explore the vast world

Enemies of the Realm

Abaddon - Chaos Eternal

Karmundur - King of Flames

CONTROLS

Cross UI Interact/Attack

Circle  UI Back/Cancel attack 

Thumbsticks for Navigation

A game proudly created by:
